channel.title: NEW BASE [ Big APPLE ] --- Easy 317 Base ---
channel.description:
[u][b][size=16pt]Big APPLE[/size][/b] [/u]
[b]The last time there are alot off things what are ennoying me, one off them is that everyone uses that same old server Bases. I'm glad that Yz saw the same problem and than he made a new base for 317. I was thinking the same, and I started to make a server from nothing.[/b]
This Base has the cleanest [b][u]client.java[/u][/b] ever!!!
This server works with Handlers, It already has a few in it, but you still have to make more of them.
Its basic, made from SCAR, and you still need to add alot of things by yourself.
The client.jave is only 57,3 kB big, that's nothing, so it has no lag on it!
With a computer with 512 MB ram, you can hold like 300 people!
If you have 1 Gb ram, on your computer (most computers has 1 and maybe 2 Gb) than you can hold easily 450 players without lag!!
I putted the max players on 512, if there are 512 players playing, It will give the message, "World is full"
There are a few commands in, and a few basic things that I added into it.
First thing is, that when you log in that you are automaticcly an Administrator (Not the owner, just an admin)
It has basic working skills, you need to add other skills by yourself....
It has: - Yell command - MyPos command - Bank command - Pickup command - Player(s) online command - Mod command (type ::mod 0,1,2,3 for your rights) - tele command - empty command (delete everything that is in your inventory - pass command, for new password
also - kick - reboot (kick everyone and saves files)
When you log in, you have a randomize clothes on. --> Anti-masser is also already installed, mass click is connection lost and than it also don't will saves the savegame file.
[u][b]Max combat lvl is 126, max stat lvl is 99[/b][/u]
Already added skills
- Prayer (full prayer for burying) - Combat skills (You still need to enable them) Attack at the dummy is already enabled, each hit gives 20Xp (easily to change Xp) - Working teleports ( 7 added )
[b][u]The total size of the server is only 192 kB!!!!! There is no run.bat or rune*server.bat file in it, because that takes more space. Just open your "Compiler 1.2" It will ask what you want to do, run server, compile server, .... Everything what you want to do with the server, you can do it with the compiler.[/u][/b]
The item ID are also correct, it goes automaticcly to the right targetslot! That means when you want to wear a cape or an amulet or a weapon, that it go to the right spot.
[u]Here a few pictures off the new Base![/u]
[img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg68/The_predi/NEW%20BASE/RandomizeStarterOutfit.png[/img]
[img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg68/The_predi/NEW%20BASE/Dummys.png[/img]
Download link: http://files.filefront.com/Big+APPLErar/;12183191;/fileinfo.html
[size=12pt]Post comments if you think this is a good Base[/size]
